title: Backend Software Engineer, Machine Learning Platform, AI Infrastructure
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop and deploy scalable infrastructure solutions.
- Implement best practices and monitoring systems.
- Coordinate resources for high availability of cluster hardware.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Expertise in designing scalable distributed systems.
- Strong knowledge of Python/Go and Linux.
- Experience with backend infrastructure components.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- SQL/NoSQL databases, caching, message brokers.
- Containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
- Front-end development in React.

criteria.name: Industries
criteria.value: Motor Vehicle Manufacturing, Renewable Energy Semiconductor Manufacturing, and Utilities

title: Machine Learning Engineer, Integration, AI Platforms
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Develop AI solutions for FSD accessory controls.  
• Design vision-based solutions for vehicle systems.  
• Integrate with vehicle firmware for production software.  
• Analyze fleet data for feature iteration.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• Proficient in Python and deep learning frameworks.  
• Skilled in modern C++ for firmware integration.  
• Strong understanding of deep learning architectures.  
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Python  
• C++  
• Deep learning frameworks  
• Vehicle firmware integration

title: Robotics Software Engineer, Optimus Connectivity
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop Tesla’s Cellular wireless connectivity stack (LTE/5G).
- Create telemetry and analytics platform for data collection.
- Contribute to test automation frameworks for connectivity features.
- Support QA, manufacturing, and software teams.
- Rapidly prototype next-generation wireless platforms.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
- Exceptional programming skills in C/C++, Linux, and Python.
- Strong understanding of Embedded Systems and OS concepts.
- Familiarity with networking concepts like Ethernet and TCP/IP.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Cellular technologies (LTE and 5G).
- Wireless technologies (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, BLE).
- Embedded systems and operating systems.

title: Deep Learning Vision Engineer, Optimus
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Write fleet queries and Python scripts for dataset sourcing.  
• Analyze robot data distributions to identify anomalies.  
• Develop methods for data acquisition, clustering, and cleaning.  
• Build metrics to track model improvements across datasets.  
• Write alerts to flag anomalies during data collection.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• Experience with large models and datasets.  
• Proficiency in Python, SQL, and MATLAB/R.  
• Strong problem-solving skills in cross-functional teams.  
• Willingness to take on multiple roles.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Python (Pandas, NumPy)  
• SQL (PostgreSQL)  
• Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX)

title: AI Engineer, Foundation Models, Autonomy & Robotics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Own a machine learning vertical and data collection strategy.
- Design network architecture and train models at scale.
- Evaluate models in engineering Tesla vehicles.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Strong software engineering skills and problem-solving track record.
- Knowledge of deep learning concepts and optimization techniques.
- Experience with PyTorch or similar deep learning frameworks.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- PyTorch, JAX, or TensorFlow.
- Large datasets for model training.
- Multimodal models and generative learning techniques.
